markdown:
Storm lords wage battles to claim important territory within the Plane of Air. **[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 26 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21 [Storm Lord](/Monsters.aspx?ID=180) **Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 145 **Perception** +18; darkvision **Languages** [Auran](/Languages.aspx?ID=15) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +20, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +18 **Str** +4 **Dex** +7 **Con** +4 **Int** -1 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +0 --- **AC** 30 **Fort** +15 **Ref** +20 **Will** +16 **HP** 120 **Immunities** bleed, paralyzed, poison, sleep **High Winds** ([air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5), [aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206)) 20 feet. Air within the emanation is difficult terrain for Flying creatures that do not have the air trait.
**Disperse** **Trigger** The storm lord takes damage from a hostile action. **Effect** The storm lord disperses. Until the end of the current turn, it can’t be attacked or targeted, doesn’t take up space, and any auras or emanations it has are suppressed. At the end of the turn, the storm lord reforms in any space in which it can fit within 50 feet of where it dispersed and any auras or emanations it has are restored as long as their duration didn’t run out while it was dispersed. --- **Speed** fly 75 feet; swiftness **Melee** gust +20 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d12+10 bludgeoning plus Push 5 feet **Ranged** lightning lash +20 ([range increment 50 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d12+4 electricity **Swiftness** The storm lord’s movement doesn’t trigger reactions.
name: Storm Lord

Air within the emanation is difficult terrain for Flying creatures that do not have the air trait. Disperse Reaction Trigger The storm lord takes damage from a hostile action. Effect The storm lord disperses. Until the end of the current turn, it can’t be attacked or targeted, doesn’t take up space, and any auras or emanations it has are suppressed. At the end of the turn, the storm lord reforms in any space in which it can fit within 50 feet of where it dispersed and any auras or emanations it has are restored as long as their duration didn’t run out while it was dispersed. --- Speed fly 75 feet; swiftness Melee Single Action gust +20 (Finesse, reach 15 feet), Damage 2d12+10 bludgeoning plus Push 5 feet Ranged Single Action lightning lash +20 (range increment 50 feet), Damage 2d12+4 electricity Swiftness The storm lord’s movement doesn’t trigger reactions.
